en.ahmedali: This because you laughed at God's revelations and were taken in by the life of the world." So they will neither be taken out of it, nor will be asked to seek God's favour on that day.
en.ahmedraza: “This is because you mocked at the signs of Allah, and the worldly life deceived you”; so this day they are not to be removed from the fire, nor will anyone seek amends from them.
en.arberry: That is for that you took God's signs in mockery, and the present life deluded you.' So today they shall not be brought forth from it, nor will they be suffered to make amends.
en.daryabadi: That is because ye took the revelations of Allah scoffingly, and there beguiled you the life of the world. Today, therefore, they will not be taken forth therefrom, nor will they be suffered to please Allah.
en.hilali: This, because you took the revelations of Allah (this Quran) in mockery, and the life of the world deceived you. So this Day, they shall not be taken out from there (Hell), nor shall they be Yusta'tabun (i.e. they shall not return to the worldly life, so that they repent to Allah, and beg His Pardon for their sins).
en.itani: That is because you took God’s revelations for a joke, and the worldly life lured you.” So today they will not be brought out of it, and they will not be allowed to repent.
en.maududi: You reached this end because you made Allah's Signs an object of jest and the life of the world deluded you.” So they shall not be taken out of the Fire nor shall they be asked to make amends (and thus please their Lord).
en.mubarakpuri: This, because you took the revelations of Allah in mockery, and the life of the world deceived you. So this Day, they shall not be taken out from there (Hell), nor shall they be returned to the worldly life.
en.pickthall: This, forasmuch as ye made the revelations of Allah a jest, and the life of the world beguiled you. Therefor this day they come not forth from thence, nor can they make amends.
en.qarai: That is because you took the signs of Allah in derision, and the life of the world had deceived you.’ So today, they will not be brought out of it, nor will they be asked to propitiate [Allah].
en.qaribullah: That is because you took the verses of Allah (the Koran) in mockery, and you were deluded by your worldly life' So that Day they will not be brought outof it; nor shall they be repentant.
en.sahih: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
en.sarwar: This is only because you had mocked the revelations of God and the worldly life had deceived you. On this day they will not be taken out of hell, nor will they be granted any favors.
en.shakir: That is because you took the communications of Allah for a jest and the life of this world deceived you. So on that day they shall not be brought forth from it, nor shall they be granted goodwill.
en.transliteration: Thalikum biannakumu ittakhathtum ayati Allahi huzuwan wagharratkumu alhayatu alddunya faalyawma la yukhrajoona minha wala hum yustaAAtaboona
en.wahiduddin: That is because you made a mockery of God's revelations and were deluded by the life of this world." Therefore, today they will not be brought out of the Fire, nor will they be allowed to make amends.
en.yusufali: "This, because ye used to take the Signs of Allah in jest, and the life of the world deceived you:" (From) that Day, therefore, they shall not be taken out thence, nor shall they be received into Grace.
fa.ansarian: این [عذاب] برای این است که شما آیات خدا را به مسخره گرفته اید و زندگی دنیا، شما را فریفت؛ پس امروز نه آنان را از آتش بیرون آورند و نه از آنان می خواهند که [برای به دست آوردن خشنودی خدا] عذرخواهی کنند.
fa.ayati: و اين به كيفر آن است كه آيات خدا را به مسخره مى‌گرفتيد و زندگى دنيوى شما را بفريفت. پس امروز از اين آتش كسى بيرونشان نبرد و كسى عذرشان را نپذيرد.
fa.bahrampour: اين بدان سبب است كه شما آيات خدا را به ريشخند گرفتيد و زندگى دنيا فريبتان داد پس امروز نه از اين [آتش‌] بيرون آورده شوند و نه عذرشان پذيرفته گردد
fa.fooladvand: اين بدان سبب است كه شما آيات خدا را به ريشخند گرفتيد و زندگى دنيا فريبتان داد. پس امروز نه از اين [آتش‌] بيرون آورده مى‌شوند، و نه عذرشان پذيرفته مى‌گردد.
fa.ghomshei: این عذاب شما کیفر آن است که به آیات خدا تمسخر کردید و مغرور زندگانی دنیا شدید. پس کافران امروز از آتش دوزخ رهایی ندارند و هیچ عذر و توبه ایشان نپذیرند.
fa.khorramdel: (گرفتار شدنتان بدین سرنوشت اسفناک) بدان خاطر است که شما آیات خدا را به تمسخر گرفته‌اید و زندگی دنیا، شما را گول زده است. امروز آنان از آتش دوزخ بیرون آورده نمی‌شوند، و از ایشان خواسته نمی‌شود که عذرخواهی کنند و خوشنودی بطلبند. [[«ذلِکُمْ»: گرفتار شدن شما بدین سرنوشت غم‌انگیز و عذاب دردناک. «غَرَّتْکُمْ»: شما را گول زده است (نگا: انعام / 70 و 130، اعراف / 51) «یُسْتَعْتَبُونَ»: (نگا: نحل / 84، روم / 57، فصّلت / 24).]]
fa.khorramshahi: این از آن است که آیات الهی را به ریشخند گرفتید و زندگانی دنیا شما را فریفت، پس امروز، نه از آن بیرون برده شوند، نه عذرشان را بپذیرند
fa.makarem: این بخاطر آن است که شما آیات خدا را به مسخره گرفتید و زندگی دنیا شما را فریب داد! «امروز نه آنان را از دوزخ بیرون می‌آورند، و نه هیچ‌گونه عذری از آنها پذیرفته می‌شود!
fa.moezzi: این بدان است که گرفتید آیتهای خدا را ریشخند و فریب داد شما را زندگانی دنیا پس امروز برون آورده نشوند از آن و نه بهانه پذیرفته شود از ایشان‌
fa.mojtabavi: اين [عذاب‌] به سبب آن است كه شما آيات خدا را به مسخره گرفتيد و زندگى دنيا شما را بفريفت، پس امروز از آن
fa.sadeqi: این به‌راستی بدین سبب است، که شما آیات خدا را به ریشخند گرفتید و زندگی دنیا فریبتان داد.» پس امروز نه از این (آتش) بیرون آورده می‌شوند و نه عتاب و سرزنش می‌گردند (که ارزش سرزنش را هم ندارند).

text: فَلِلَّهِ‌ الْحَمْدُ رَبِ‌ السَّمَاوَاتِ‌ وَ رَبِ‌ الْأَرْضِ‌ رَبِ‌ الْعَالَمِينَ‌

en.ahmedali: All praise be to God, Lord of the heavens, Lord of the earth, Lord of all the worlds.
en.ahmedraza: So all praise is for Allah only, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, the Lord of the Creation!
en.arberry: So to God belongs praise, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, Lord of all Being.
en.daryabadi: All praise, then, Unto Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.
en.hilali: So all the praises and thanks are to Allah, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, and the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
en.itani: Praise belongs to God; Lord of the heavens, Lord of the earth, Lord of humanity.
en.maududi: So all praise be to Allah, the Lord of the heavens, the Lord of the earth, the Lord of the whole Universe.
en.mubarakpuri: So all praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, and the Lord of all that exists.
en.pickthall: Then praise be to Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, the Lord of the Worlds.
en.qarai: So all praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, the Lord of all the worlds.
en.qaribullah: Praise, belongs to Allah, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Worlds.
en.sahih: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.
en.sarwar: It is only God, Lord of the heavens and the earth and Lord of the Universe who deserves all praise.
en.shakir: Therefore to Allah is due (all) praise, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, the Lord of the worlds.
en.transliteration: Falillahi alhamdu rabbi alssamawati warabbi alardi rabbi alAAalameena
en.wahiduddin: Praise, then, be to God, Lord of the heavens, and Lord of the earth, the Lord of all the worlds.
en.yusufali: Then Praise be to Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth,- Lord and Cherisher of all the Worlds!
fa.ansarian: نهایتاً همه ستایشها مخصوص خداست که پروردگار آسمان ها و پروردگار زمین و پروردگار جهانیان است؛
fa.ayati: ستايش از آنِ خداست، پروردگار آسمانها و پروردگار زمين و پروردگار جهانيان.
fa.bahrampour: پس حمد و سپاس از آن خداست كه پروردگار آسمان‌ها و پروردگار زمين و پروردگار جهانيان است
fa.fooladvand: پس سپاس از آن خداست: پروردگار آسمانها و پروردگار زمين، پروردگار جهانيان.
fa.ghomshei: باری ستایش و سپاس مخصوص خداست که به یکتایی آفریننده آسمانها و زمین و همه جهانهای بی نهایت است.
fa.khorramdel: ستایش تنها خداوندی را سزا است که پروردگار آسمانها و پروردگار زمین و پروردگار همه‌ی جهانیان است. [[«رَبِّ»: تکرار این لفظ برای تأکید است و هر سه واژه بدل یا صفت (الله) می‌باشند.]]
fa.khorramshahi: سپاس خداوند راست، که پروردگار آسمانها و زمین [و] پروردگار جهانیان است‌
fa.makarem: پس حمد و ستایش مخصوص خداست، پروردگار آسمانها و پروردگار زمین و پروردگار همه جهانیان!
fa.moezzi: پس خدای را است سپاس پروردگار آسمانها و پروردگار زمین پروردگار جهانیان‌
fa.mojtabavi: پس سپاس و ستايش خداى راست، خداوند آسمانها و زمين، پروردگار جهانيان.
fa.sadeqi: پس سپاس تنها از آنِ خداست؛ پروردگار آسمان‌ها و پروردگار زمین و پروردگار جهانیان‌.

text: وَ لَهُ‌ الْکِبْرِيَاءُ فِي‌ السَّمَاوَاتِ‌ وَ الْأَرْضِ‌ وَ هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَکِيمُ‌

en.ahmedali: His is the supremacy in the heavens and the earth; and He is the all-mighty and all-wise.
en.ahmedraza: And for Him only is the Greatness, in the heavens and in the earth; and He only is the Most Honourable, the Wise.
en.arberry: His is the Domination an the heavens and the earth; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
en.daryabadi: And His alone is the Majesty in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
en.hilali: And His (Alone) is the Majesty in the heavens and the earth, and He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
en.itani: To Him belongs all supremacy in the heavens and the earth. He is the Majestic, the Wise.
en.maududi: His is the glory in the heavens and the earth. He is the Most Mighty, the Most Wise.
en.mubarakpuri: And His is the majesty in the heavens and the earth, and He is Al-`Aziz, Al-Hakim.
en.pickthall: And unto Him (alone) belongeth Majesty in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
en.qarai: To Him belongs all supremacy in the heavens and the earth, and He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
en.qaribullah: His is the Pride in the heavens and earth. He is the Almighty, the Wise.
en.sahih: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
en.sarwar: It is His greatness that dominates the heavens and the earth. He is the Majestic and All-wise.
en.shakir: And to Him belongs greatness in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
en.transliteration: Walahu alkibriyao fee alssamawati waalardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeemu
en.wahiduddin: All greatness belongs to Him in the heavens and earth. He is the Almighty, the All Wise.
en.yusufali: To Him be glory throughout the heavens and the earth: and He is Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom!
fa.ansarian: و کبریایی و عظمت در آسمان ها و زمین ویژه اوست، و او توانای شکست ناپذیر و حکیم است.
fa.ayati: بزرگوارى در آسمانها و زمين خاص اوست، و اوست پيروزمند و حكيم.
fa.bahrampour: و كبريايى و عظمت در آسمان‌ها و زمين، از آن اوست و اوست شكست ناپذير حكيم
fa.fooladvand: و در آسمانها و زمين، بزرگى از آن اوست، و اوست شكست‌ناپذير سنجيده‌كار.
fa.ghomshei: و مقام جلال و کبریایی در آسمانها و زمین مخصوص اوست و او یکتا خدای مقتدر حکیم است.
fa.khorramdel: بزرگواری و والائی در آسمانها و زمین، از آن او است، و او صاحب عزّت و قدرت، و دارای حکمت و فلسفه (در همه‌ی امور) است. [[«الْکِبْرِیَآءُ»: عظمت و رفعت. شاهی و والائی (نگا: یونس / 78).]]
fa.khorramshahi: و تنها او را در آسمانها و زمین بزرگی سزد، و او پیروزمند فرزانه است‌
fa.makarem: و برای اوست کبریا و عظمت در آسمانها و زمین، و اوست عزیز و حکیم!
fa.moezzi: و او را است برتری در آسمانها و زمین و او است عزّتمند حکیم‌
fa.mojtabavi: و او راست بزرگى در آسمانها و زمين و اوست تواناى بى‌همتا و داناى با حكمت.
fa.sadeqi: و در آسمان‌ها و زمین، تنها بزرگی از آنِ اوست و تنها اوست عزیز حکیم.
